0.text: Bug 49937  Problems with AsyncListener and resource injection.

1.text: Created attachment 26031 [details] propose fix for a couple possible async listener problems  I asked about these on the dev list and am proposing some simple fixes in case there's agreement that they are bugs.

3.text: AsyncListeners are subject to resource injection from annotations, so they should be created using the instance manager.

4.text: To get the instance manager to the AyncContextImpl I added a getInstanceManager() method to the Context interface.

5.text: Maybe there's a better way, this interface is currently not very small or simple.

6.text: 2. various application code can use one of the ServletContext.addListener methods to tell the container to scan for annotations.

7.text: Just because tomcat doesn't yet actually scan doesn't mean it should throw an exception if you try this.
